algorithm_technique: Sorting and finding minimum difference between adjacent elements
problem_summary_simple: Partition an array into two non-empty parts to minimize the difference between the max of one and min of the other.
problem_summary_technical: Sort the array and find the minimum difference between adjacent elements to minimize |max(nums1) - min(nums2)|.
key_insights: To minimize |max(nums1) - min(nums2)|, the elements in nums1 and nums2 should be as close as possible.
Sorting the array brings elements that are close in value next to each other.
The minimum difference between adjacent elements after sorting will yield the optimal partition.
